title: Basket
description: x402 v2 basket extension for itemized payment requests

id.description: Optional unique identifier for the line item. Useful for inventory tracking, refunds, and correlation across requests.

name.description: Display name for the line item

price.description: Amount in the smallest unit of the asset (e.g., for USDC with 6 decimals, 1000000 = $1.00)

quantity.description: Number of units of this item

tax.description: Tax amount in the smallest unit of the asset

discount.description: Discount amount in the smallest unit of the asset

metadata.description: Additional metadata for this line item
